Articles.Content:
Hello I am working on a game using Unity3D. It is also my first game. I made a thread on the Unity forums which gives a bit more information. Here is an update video of showing what I have so far. I will be posting these videos on the thread on the Unity forums weekly. Tell me what you think of it.

Link to Unity Forum
Haha, this is cool. What exactly is your goal with this game?
I'm thinking the Porkahontus may have the crew of Epic Mealtime in her sights.
Sorry for bringing this thread back from the dead, but have you made any progress on this game tygoo7? There aren't any posts in the unity thread since December 1, 2014.

Sorry for bringing this thread back from the dead, but have you made any progress on this game tygoo7? There aren't any posts in the unity thread since December 1, 2014.

The last update to his game was in November 2014, at least according to the website and his youtube.
Thank god! Not another space-ship-building-flying-ksp-a-like game that comes from a ksp forum goer
How did the author arrive at Porkahontas as a title choice? That just.. totally sounds like something else. I came into this thread anticipating use of the report button.

How did the author arrive at Porkahontas as a title choice? That just.. totally sounds like something else. I came into this thread anticipating use of the report button.

I don't understand how it could be taken in a bad way. It's a playoff of the Name Pocahontas using pork since you play as a pig. I think it's hilarious.
We can re-open the thread if need be, but for now, looks like this is a dead issue.
